name: Sticky Block (itch)
description:
Sticky Block! The only game that allows you to leisurely stack blocks on a cute low-poly world. Play against friends to compete for the highest score! [*FIXED*]
  • Resolution - Resolution is now automatically set to 720 x 1280 to simulate mobile!
  • DOF - Depth of field updated to fit new resolution.
[*TO DO*]
  • Animations
  • Particles
  • UN-BLUR THE LIMIT BAR!
  • Various lighting fixes
  • High Score Tracker
  • Mobile Build! IOS and Android!
  • More
